title: Storm vs Valkyries
description: This event is for the upcoming WNBA game, scheduled for June 29 at 8:30PM ET between Seattle Storm and Golden State Valkyries.

markets.question: Storm vs Valkyries
markets.description:
In the upcoming WNBA game, scheduled for June 29 at 8:30PM ET:
If the Seattle Storm win, the market will resolve to "Storm".
If the Golden State Valkyries win, the market will resolve to "Valkyries".
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

title: Will Ace Bailey play in the Jazz Summer League?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Ace Bailey plays in any of the Utah Jazz’s Summer League games for the 2025 NBA Summer League. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Bailey is cut, traded, retires, or is otherwise officially ruled out for the game, this market will resolve to "No".

"Playing" is defined as Ace Bailey playing at least 1 second in the game. Merely being on the game-day roster will not qualify for a "Yes" resolution.

The resolution source for this market will be information from the NBA.

title: MSI Play-in: G2 vs. Bilibili Gaming
description:
G2 Esports and Bilibili Gaming are scheduled to play each other in the play-in of the Mid-Season Invitational on June 28 2025, at 8:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to “G2” if G2 wins against Bilibili Gaming in the best of 5, play-in matchup of the Mid-Season Invitational.

This market will resolve to “Bilibili Gaming” if Bilibili Gaming wins against G2 in the best of 5, play-in matchup of the Mid-Season Invitational.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from LoL Esports (https://lolesports.com/en-GB/tournament/113470835034591734/overview).

title: Bitcoin Price - June 29, 5PM ET
description:

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.
